text:
LinkedIn | Sunnyvale, CA | Full-Time | On-Site | Senior Software Engineers

LinkedIn connects the world's professionals to make them more productive and successful. With more than 500 million members worldwide, including executives from every Fortune 500 company, LinkedIn is the world's largest professional network on the Internet.

Please feel free to reach out at lnnguyen@linkedin.com if you are interested in the following roles:

-Applications Development -Front-End/UI Engineering -Mobile Applications -Systems and Infrastructure -Data Analysis, Data Mining and Machine Learning -Tools Engineering -Performance Engineering
